title: Dictionary Phonebook
description: Create a program that simulates a phonebook using a dictionary. The program should have the following functionality: add a new contact, remove a contact, update a contact's phone number, and search for a contact by name. The program should continue to run until the user chooses to exit.
sample_input:
add John 1234567890
remove John
update Jane 9876543210
search Jane
sample_output:
Contact added: John 1234567890
Contact removed: John
Contact updated: Jane 9876543210
Contact found: Jane 9876543210
